EmailTemplate.subject: TPA Summit: See our multi-program chronic condition solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The power of a multi-program chronic condition solution Managing multiple chronic conditions can be a huge challenge. Yet the right solution can yield huge results for employers and the people they serve. During our recent Virtual Partner Summit we heard from Teladoc Health experts Teresa Rueckert and Kelly Dockins on the role TPA partners can play, including: • Addressing a full continuum of care across diabetes, hypertension, prediabetes, weight management and mental health (check out the demo!) • How a whole-person approach drives better clinical outcomes immediately and over time • The impact a unified, personalized experience has on employee engagement and satisfaction About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
